question: This team sport, popular in Commonwealth countries, is played on a rectangular court divided into three sections, with a goal ring at each end. It features seven players on each team, each assigned to specific positions with defined areas of the court where they can operate. The objective is to score goals by passing a ball and shooting it through the opponent's goal ring. What is the name of this sport, similar to basketball but with restrictions on player movement with the ball?

This NFL player recently signed a 3-year $100 million contract with the Seattle Seahawks after playing one year with the Minnesota Vikings. This quarterback, known for his strong arm and his ability to make throws from various arm angles, was drafted third overall by the New York Jets in the 2018 NFL Draft. He played college football at the University of Southern California (USC), where he won the Pac-12 South Division title in 2017. Name this player who has also played for the Carolina Panthers and the San Francisco 49ers.

This NFL player was recently traded from the Seattle Seahawks to the Las Vegas Raiders where he signed a contract extension. This quarterback, once considered a journeyman, experienced a career resurgence with the Seattle Seahawks, earning NFL Comeback Player of the Year honors in 2022. He was drafted by the New York Jets in the second round of the 2013 NFL Draft and has also played for the New York Giants and the Los Angeles Chargers. He played college football at West Virginia University, where he set numerous school records. Who is this quarterback, known for his resilience and his impressive performance in recent seasons?
